import React, { useEffect, useState, useRef } from "react"; //import { Radar } from "react-chartjs-2"; import usePlayers from "../../hooks/skrallgaming/usePlayers"; import playersArray from "../../globals/skrallgaming/players" import placings from "../../globals/skrallgaming/placings" import "../../assets/style/skrallgaming/createThornament.css" export default function CreateThornament(){ const { players, setPlayers } = usePlayers() const [ teams, setTeams ] = useState([]) const [ tournamentName, setTournamentName] = useState('SSE-II 2022 Smash Doubles') const [ gameFormat, setGameFormat] = useState('2v2') const [ game, setGame] = useState('smash') const [ groupStage, setGroupStage ] = useState(true) const [ groupMaxPlayers, setGroupMaxPlayers ] = useState(4) const [ teamName, setTeamName] = useState() const [ p1, setP1 ] = useState() const [ p2, setP2 ] = useState() useState(() => {if (!players?.lenght) setPlayers(playersArray)}, []) const registerTeam = () =>{ if (!p1 || !p2) return let arr = [...[], ...teams] arr.push({ name: teamName, players: [p1, p2] }) setTeams(arr); } const removeTeam = (i) => { let arr = [...[], ...teams] arr.splice(i, 1) setTeams(arr) } const startThornament = () => { } return <>
Tournament Info
setTournamentName(e.target.value)} /> Tournament Name
Game Format
Game
setGroupStage(!groupStage)}/>
{groupStage &&<>
setGroupMaxPlayers(v.target.value)} /> Max players per group
}

Player 1

setTeamName(e.target.value)} onKeyDown={(k) => {if(k.key === "Enter") registerTeam()}} /> Team name
Registered Teams {teams && teams.map((t, i) => ) }

{i+1} {t.name} {t.players.join(' & ')} removeTeam(i)}>❌
{ teams &&
Hold to start Thornament
}
}
